accept_tutorial: Read the instructions and finish the tutorial
add_pink_dresses: Add two pink summer dresses (size M) to shopping cart
offer_green_coat: Search and apply free code to the green coat
add_green_coat: Add green coat to shopping cart
add_bomber_jacket: Add bomber jacket to favorites and shopping cart
delete_item: Delete green coat from shopping cart
make_purchase: Buy shopping cart and fill in the shipping information
